The XML definition of the template is a simple list of fields. Each field in the definition represents a field in the page editor.

<h3 id="ExampleXMLfortemplate">Example XML for template definition (7.3)</h3>
<pre class="wiki">
@<fields>@
    @<field name="dateField" type="date" description="birthday"/>@
    @<field name="oneLine" type="text_field" />@
    @<field name="oneLineWithValidation" type="text_field" regexp="\d{1,3}"/>@
    @<field name="manyLines" type="text_area" title="Longer text" />@
    @<field name="richText" type="html" />@
   @<field name="checkBoxes" type="checkbox">@
        @<option default="true" title="My Value" value="my_value"/>@
        @<option title="Other Value" value="other_value"/>@
    @</field>@
    @<field name="radio" type="radio">@
        @<option default="true" title="My Value" value="my_value"/>@
        @<option title="Other Value" value="other_value"/>@
    @</field>@
    @<field name="combos" type="combobox">@
        @<option default="true" title="My Value" value="my_value"/>@
        @<option title="Other Value" value="other_value"/>@
    @</field>@
    @<field name="list" type="list">@
        @<option default="true" title="My Value" value="my_value"/>@
        @<option title="Other Value" value="other_value"/>@
    @</field>@
    @<field name="photo" type="image"/>@
    @<field name="number" type="number"/>@
    @<field name="category" type="taxonomy" vocabulary="/path/to/file"/>@
@</fields>@
</pre>
<h3 id="Attributes">Attributes</h3>
<ul>
    <li><strong>name</strong> = name of the field.</li>
    <li><strong>type</strong> = type of the field, see below.</li>
    <li><strong>regexp</strong> = <i>Optional</i> regular expression for the field validation.</li>
    <li><strong>title</strong> = <i>Optional</i> title of the field. Used instead of name for the page editing dialog. Can be changed without affecting the template processing</li>
    <li><strong>description</strong> = <i>Optional</i> description of the field. Displayed in the tool tips of the page editing dialog. C
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="content-type">an be changed without affecting the template processing                              </meta>
    </li>
</ul>
<h3 id="Fieldtypes">Field types</h3>
<ul>
    <li><tt>date</tt> date field with calendar popup.</li>
    <li><tt>html</tt> FCKEditor for rich text editing.</li>
    <li><tt>checkbox</tt> checkbox group with defined option values.</li>
    <li><tt>radio</tt> radio button group with defined option values.</li>
    <li><tt>combobox</tt> combobox group with defined option values.</li>
    <li><tt>list</tt> list with defined option values.</li>
    <li><tt>image</tt> image selector.</li>
    <li><tt>number</tt> number, stored as BigDecimal.</li>
    <li><tt>taxonomy</tt> taxonomy field with specified vocabulary. Selected terms are stored as list.</li>
</ul>
